books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training might require her to betray the man she loves.
books.name: IRON FLAME

books.author: by James McBride
books.description: Secrets held by the residents of a dilapidated neighborhood come to life when a skeleton is found at the bottom of a well.
books.name: THE HEAVEN & EARTH GROCERY STORE

books.author: by James Patterson and Brian Sitts
books.description: Three private investigators working in New York City draw the attention of an N.Y.P.D. detective.
books.name: HOLMES, MARPLE & POE

books.author: by Ashley Elston
books.description: A woman who works for a mysterious boss takes on a new identity to dig up information on someone.
books.name: FIRST LIE WINS

books.author: by Hannah Grace
books.description: Anastasia might need the help of the captain of a college hockey team to get on the Olympic figure skating team.
books.name: ICEBREAKER

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.name: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: by Aurora Ascher
books.description: When Harrow takes an interest in a winged beast new to the area, old enemies turn up to get their revenge on her.
books.name: SANCTUARY OF THE SHADOW

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: Passion arises between Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar as they seek to avenge the deaths of Bryce’s friends.
books.name: HOUSE OF EARTH AND BLOOD

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The fifth book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Nesta Archeron is forced into close quarters with a warrior named Cassian.
books.name: A COURT OF SILVER FLAMES

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The second book in the Crescent City series. Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar must choose to fight or stay silent.
books.name: HOUSE OF SKY AND BREATH

books.author: by Ana Huang
books.description: The first book in the Twisted series. Secrets emerge when Ava explores things with her brother’s best friend.
books.name: TWISTED LOVE

books.author: by Shelby Van Pelt
books.description: A widow working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium is aided in solving a mystery by a giant Pacific octopus living there.
books.name: REMARKABLY BRIGHT CREATURES

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US
